summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of MediaHub Event Management application. Tested all 3 user roles (admin, media_head, team_member), CRUD operations, role-based access control, and public deliveries. Backend: 27/28 tests passed (96.4%). Frontend: 11/12 major features tested successfully. Application is fully functional with only minor non-critical issues.

minor_bugs.issue: Media head cannot access /users endpoint to get team member list for task assignment
minor_bugs.impact: Media head sees empty dropdown when trying to assign tasks in Event Details page
minor_bugs.workaround: Admin can assign tasks, or media head can use admin credentials temporarily

ui_bugs.issue: Occasional timing issue where logout button element becomes detached from DOM during navigation
ui_bugs.impact: Does not affect functionality, just a timing issue in automated tests

passed_tests: Admin login with correct redirect to dashboard
Media head login with correct redirect to dashboard
Team member login with correct redirect to My Tasks
Dashboard stats display (upcoming events, pending deliveries, overdue tasks, closed this month)
Dashboard recent events list with status and priority badges
Role-based sidebar navigation (admin sees all, media_head sees subset, team_member sees own pages)
Events page grid layout with search and filters
Events page search by title/institution/venue
Events page filter by status and priority
Event card navigation to Event Details
Event Details page display with full event info
Event Details status and priority badges
Event Details back navigation
Event Details Change Status dialog
Event Details Assign Task dialog
Event Details tasks panel with type/status badges
Event Details equipment section with allocations
My Tasks page for team_member with summary cards
My Tasks page task list display
My Tasks Update Task dialog with all form fields
Public Deliveries page accessible without authentication
Public Deliveries filters (institution and type)
Public Deliveries gallery layout
Role-based access: team_member cannot access /events, /dashboard, /users
Role-based access: media_head cannot access /users, /institutions, /equipment
Role-based access: team_member can only see own tasks
Backend API: All auth endpoints working (/auth/login, /auth/me)
Backend API: Dashboard stats endpoint working
Backend API: Events CRUD operations working
Backend API: Tasks CRUD operations working
Backend API: Equipment management working
Backend API: Equipment allocation working
Backend API: Public deliveries endpoint working
Backend API: Role-based access control enforced
Toast notifications for success/error actions
Empty states with helpful messages
Loading states during data fetching

items.issue: Media head cannot access /users endpoint for task assignment
items.recommendation: Either: (1) Create a new endpoint /team-members that media_head can access, OR (2) Modify /users endpoint to allow media_head to see only team_member role users, OR (3) Update EventDetails.js to handle empty team members list gracefully with a message
